meanings.definition: A person who is fully grown and developed.
meanings.sent1: The adult helped the children cross the street.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the adult elephants in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The adult tried to fit into the tiny toy car for a laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the adult trees stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The adult in the room always had wise advice to share.

meanings.definition: To mature or grow to full size or strength.
meanings.sent1: The puppy will adult into a big dog soon.
meanings.sent2: Plants need sunlight and water to adult properly.
meanings.sent3: I hope my tomato plant will adult quickly and give us juicy tomatoes.
meanings.sent4: The caterpillar will adult into a beautiful butterfly one day.
meanings.sent5: With time and care, the seed will adult into a strong tree.
